title: Use TensorFlow to classify clothing images (Coding TensorFlow)
excerpt: Using ML to classify T-shirts, sandals, and ankle boots? Oh my! In this episode of Coding TensorFlow, Magnus Hyttsten shows you how to train a deep neural network model to classify images of clothing. We are going to use a dataset you may be familiar with called the Fashion MNIST. Through Colab, we will
